name: Jacqueline Turn's Cursed Candy Adventure
description:
Jacqueline Turn's Cursed Candy Adventure

Oh no! A witch stole your Halloween candy stash and stored it in her spooky haunted house! Go on a perilous adventure to recover your precious sweets.

Controls
  • A & D - walking
  • Space - jumping
  • Escape - pause
Credits
  • Art and Animation: Katie Lichter
  • Writing: Abbhinav Jayaraman
  • Programming: Alexander Davis, Jack Burrus,  Jaylen Davis, Rodrigo Okamoto
  • Design: Jaylen Davis
  • Sound effects and music: https://freesound.org/
Characters

Jacqueline Turn

Zombie

Bat

Frog

Spider
